findings.title: Potential frontrunning and/or gaming the incentive structure created by the Bancor V2 formula
findings.description: Arbitrageurs could frontrun Oracle updates and make conversions that took the future rebalancing into account. Users could also minimize slippage and fees by atomically adding and removing large amounts of liquidity before and after a conversion.

findings.title: Risks associated with staking tokens in the pool
findings.description: Clearly inform liquidity providers about the risks associated with staking tokens in the pool.
